website_summaries.verdict: One of this marinade injector's best features is its affordable price point. For the same price as a unreliable plastic injector, owners get the strength and needle depth of a stainless steel model.
pros: Long needle allows for deeper injections
Stainless steel construction at a typically plastic price point
cons: Plunger can be difficult to push
Injector can develop a leak at the needle/barrel junction if cross-threaded

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for injecting my thanksgiving turkey. I'm on my 2nd year now using this and have to say I love it. Heavy duty construction ...just be mindful of the silicon o-rings on the needles they can tend to fall off easily. My injection recipe is - 2 cups chicken broth - 1/2 stick butter - fresh marjoram/parsley/sage/rosemary finely chopped - ground pepper - about a tbs Yardbird rub Simmer in pot then inject....mix all same ingredients in a butter paste and rub outside.....this has been a hit every year. Of course it's smoked in my Traeger using Apple wood pellets which adds a lot to the flavor but you can definitely taste the difference the injection makes
customer_reviews.author: Marcus W Austin

customer_reviews.title: Solid injector
customer_reviews.text: This injector seems to be a very solid well made stainless injector. Have only used it once at this point but it went together and worked without leaking. What more do you want? The only thing that would be nice would be a little more information included in the package on using marinade with this injector and maybe point out some finer points (like the plunger part has markings but they are faint and somewhat hard to see). I would buy again without problem. It comes in a nice package that can be used to store it when not in use as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Henley

customer_reviews.title: Very nice injector
customer_reviews.text: I've owned two injectors in the past. One was pretty cheap. It got the job done for a Thanksgiving turkey but that was it. The second was more expensive and plastic. It lasted a couple of years but eventually the dishwasher killed it. After buying this injector I don't believe I will be needing another. This injector feels like it will last. It is well made and very sturdy. I especially like the large needle that is designed to inject small pieces of garlic, jalapenos, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Rock Star

customer_reviews.title: Dr. Frankensteen would be proud to have this in his laboratory.
customer_reviews.text: It works, it's powerful and it's well made. (Marty Feldman had to have designed it.) You need two hands to use it. (2 ounces is plenty big to handle per injection.) The needles have nice wide diameters that have yet to clog. You need to unscrew the top/plunger assembly and needle from the barrel and put them all in a tall tumbler and clean it with very hot water to remove all the injectate. Just putting the pieces in a dishwasher won't guarantee internal cleanliness. I keep it assembled with all my other stainless steel bar paraphernalia. Great item. Great conversation piece. Great accessory for Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: DougChoz

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews on several different injectors and the the problems with some I spent the money and bought this one. Today was the first day that I used it, I made a cajun spice and mixed it with chicken broth that I injected into a turkey I was bbqing, I also made a brown sugar and maple syrup glaze that I injected into a ham, these were for thanksgiving dinner, everybody was extremely impressed, the flavor went throughout the meats, the syringe worked perfectly. Seems like a really well made product that will last for years. I am already trying to think of some new ideas for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kraig McCluskey

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product. I have purchased many injectors over the years, and they always seem to have some sort of shortcoming in the threads for needle attachment or the plunger seal, this product however is an almost medical grade quality and all stainless steel (except the high quality rubber seal on plunger). It has TWO needles, one with a hole at the end and one with 3 holes spaced about a 1/2' apart, and comes in a durable foam container for safe storage. Delivered on time and as promised.
customer_reviews.author: DrunksFromAz

customer_reviews.title: Quality kitchen tool, sadly made in China
customer_reviews.text: Though I have not yet used this injector there is no doubt it is a quality kitchen tool & priced very nicely. It comes with two injectors that would screw on for a tight fit. It is heavy gauge stainless that gives very good suction when I trialed it with water for now. I expect to use it in a few weeks with a turkey breast and later for a chicken roast once I find a simple good recipe for an oven roast. This one will hold up to heat over time unlike those plastic ones I had considered.
customer_reviews.author: DobeLady

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, but Be Careful
customer_reviews.text: Don't do serious injecting for long periods (multiple turkeys or roasts, etc) with your hands in the position shown in the photo. Put the pad of your thumb in the ring to do the squeezing, and not the middle part of your thumb. I actually did some pretty good damage to the bone against the base of my thumb. Odd injury, I know, but it hurt for about a month after. I'm sure it's the same issue with any injector syringe of this type, so not a huge knock against this one specifically.
customer_reviews.author: JWY

customer_reviews.title: Says it works great for him when marinating meats and hasn't let him ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a fathers day gift for my husband. He loves it. Says it works great for him when marinating meats and hasn't let him down yet. Had it for over a year now and it is still going strong. Works so much better than those flimsy injectors you get with your turkey marinade around Thanksgiving time. Because of the size of the bore of the needle you can get a thicker marinade in. Not to terrible to clean. suck up some hot soapy water a few times and rinse.
customer_reviews.author: Chevy BlueTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Super Heavy Duty!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow - this is like something that you would see the super professional, award winning bar-b-que competition people using!!! It is sturdy and heavy duty. I can't imagine this tool would ever wear out or need to be replaced unless it got lost. Injecting meats with flavorings will be so easy with this stainless steel syringe. My friends will be so impressed with my tools and skills - they will all want to know where they can get one of these (Amazon, of course)!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Thurmer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This meat injector seems to work well, though the tooling on the actual injector was a bit rough and my husband commented on that fact. The injector holds a fair amount of fluid and pierced the meat cleanly and effectively. The parts come apart for cleaning. I think the main complaint we have about the product is the packaging. It comes in a styrofoam brick of sorts inside a box - oh boy is it tough to get that brick thing out of the box!!!
customer_reviews.author: Velikova

customer_reviews.title: Leaked
customer_reviews.text: Would not hold the liquid in, it leaked out before injecting
customer_reviews.author: Jim S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent - well made and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Excellent - well made and easy to use. Haven't used it with any thick liquids yet but with the large needle I don't see any issues. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Schutsky

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product, quite a bit cheaper than some others. Works great and holds allot of liquid. Very satisfied with this purchase, I'll be looking for this brand when I purchased other grilling products
customer_reviews.author: Johnny d

customer_reviews.title: ... juice into a brisket before smoking and it works great. I holds a good amount of juice and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for injecting juice into a brisket before smoking and it works great. I holds a good amount of juice and the needle is plenty sharp to pierce the meat. The only draw back I found it the plunger is a little hard to pull back and draw the juice in to the body. The thumb ring is a nice feature when injecting.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: They are great for my purposes (though I'll probably have to replace ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these specifically for mixing 2-part paints & resin/hardeners in small batches from large containers, and for rinsing my paint gun with solvent. They are very well constructed, & seal well. They are great for my purposes (though I'll probably have to replace the silicone o-rings with teflon o-rings down the road). They probably also work well as a marinade injector.
customer_reviews.author: JMD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome injector - limit your injection points!
customer_reviews.text: Love the grill injector - very heavy gauge steel so I know it will last. Remember to limit the number of holes: use the same hole to reach different angles. My first use I didn't know this and ended up with the infusion squirting out of other holes as I injected it! I overcame this by wrapping the meat loosely in plastic wrap so it could contain the infusion over night. Anyway, a great product - definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ben McClelland

customer_reviews.title: Quality injector
customer_reviews.text: This is so much better than the plastic one it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Danl

customer_reviews.title: This is way better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is way better than I expected! Heavy duty steel that weighs 9.5 ounces. Two different needles Excelent choice if you want first class quality. Do not pass this up! Number one quality and will last you a life time. Don't buy plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It drips when u have fluid in it without pushing
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin fuller

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this injector. It is the perfect size and has 3 injector needles as well as extra rubber o-rings. Definitely well made.
customer_reviews.author: ktqh

customer_reviews.title: nice unit
customer_reviews.text: works fine had to buy a wood box to put it in --it a nice unit
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: If your looking for a good injector you cant go wrong with this one
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality and works perfectly, not even comparable to the standard plastic versions. If your looking for a good injector you cant go wrong with this one, very glad I upgraded. Even comes with a nice hard foam cut out to hold it all together so your not losing your tips.. (It has 2 different ones)
customer_reviews.author: G. Rath

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good injector w/ only one issue.
customer_reviews.text: Overall this injector does a great job of getting liquid into meat. Seems sturdy and well built. Seals nicely to and doesn't leak. Only complaint is that because it seals so well it is very hard to pull/push the plunger. To get around this i spray the rubber piece on the plunger with non-stick cooking spray and it slides up and down like a dream. I have no clue what this will do to the longevity of the rubber piece but it makes it work much better.
customer_reviews.author: Creg

customer_reviews.title: Youll like it
customer_reviews.text: Its alright, struggles with the spices clogging but better than any other Ive tried.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis M. Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Product was a nice heavy weight. I liked having the option of two needles, one for liquids and one that could incorporate small spices. I did find that the needle for liquids should be for clear liquids only. I had added powdered spices which caused the needle to clog and spew liquids everywhere. Both needles have sharp edges to allow for penetration into the meat.
customer_reviews.author: Majean

customer_reviews.title: Didnt last long.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in April, 2014. I was very happy with it until June, 2015. All the "female" threads deteriorated and I could not use it. I had to make an emergency trip to WallyWorld in the middle of the night. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great job Mr. Grill!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like my new Mr. Grill flavor injector. It is very well made and easy to clean. It is a lot easier to use than my old one. I love the extra long neddles.
customer_reviews.author: scott h bailey

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Very solid and easy to hold in one hand, and relatively easy to clean by hand, easy in dishwasher. I like having 2 injector needles, but the marinade-er needle has holes that go up several inches on the needle, but not one in the very tip, so it's hard to use to fill the reservoir unless you use a test tube-like and very tall jar. I just use the injector needle, then change out to the marinade-er needle. It would also look great as a prop in the next evil scientist movie:-)
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Ray Mullins Jr

customer_reviews.title: A kitchen MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: I used the injector on my Thanksgiving turkey and it was amazing. The injector was easy to use and didn't clog like other plastic versions I have used. I was able to get deep within the meat and my turkey was full of flavor and super juicy. I look forward to making this a staple in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to my smoking supplies
customer_reviews.text: Well made, good quality product. I've used it several times and have had no problems. Cleans very easy. Goes back together easy too. Just don't be an idiot and rush screwing on the top an it won't cross thread. Very happy with form and function.
customer_reviews.author: EaSpawn

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is well put together it is made out of stainless steel, and it has foam cut-outs for storage so nothing gets damaged after use. The plastic ring inside is embedded inside an indention within the injector stem so it doesn't easily separate while injecting meats. This is a very well put together product and I'm happy I bought this one instead of a plastic one!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the el ' cheapo plastic ones
customer_reviews.text: I love to grill and I love to save money ;) Normally I buy those el-cheapo plastic injectors you find in the local grocery store or menards. No more. I got sick of the leaks and the needle coming out. I picked this up for a buddy and myself. It's Great!!
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Provides a needle for all your cooking needs. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mrray

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to infuse marinade in a turkey we were frying. It was very easy to use. It pierced through the skin with little effort. The marinade flowed through the tip with no problem even with large bits of garlic.It was also easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed in my bbq adventures
customer_reviews.text: Happy with it, doesn’t goog up when injecting herbs. Easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Rosie R.

customer_reviews.title: 2 ounces of pleasure
customer_reviews.text: Love this injector. When i do it, i do it big! I load this with a big ball of smack and push it in so deep, that it puts my butt to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wall

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy construction and easy to assemble / disassemble and clean
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as you would expect it to. Very sturdy construction and easy to assemble / disassemble and clean. I like the packaging it came in because you can reuse it for storage. That way your needles aren't rolling around loose in a drawer. I also like that it came with the two different needles, unlike others I looked at, that had only one or the other. I love that you don't need to use as much marinade when using this product as a little goes a long way when you're injecting it. Had high expectations when I ordered this and it met or surpassed them all! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: tony popelka

customer_reviews.title: I would like to start by saying
customer_reviews.text: I would like to start by saying, the injector is High quality! The gauge for all components are heavy, meaning you are not going to break it. I just received it Tuesday and I've already used it to inject a fresh ham shank with maple syrup. Since the ham skin is extremely thick, I pricked 2 holes with a knife on both sides of the ham to insert the injector in. I used the same hole to redirect the injector to different places inside the ham. When I get home today, I will put the ham on the BGE and smoke it for 14 hours. I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: nancy larkin

customer_reviews.title: Solid injector
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is nice I wasn't expecting such a solid injector comes with extra O rings and 3 needles packaged nicely I will definitely be ordering from these guys again. Again wow just wish it was made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: zachary clay higgins

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful seasoning tool for every kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful tool for the kitchen. Very sturdy, not like the cheep plastic ones found in the dollar stores. Great price an easy to clean. Bigger holes allows for more finely chopped seasonings to used. Thank is a great addition to y kitchen tools.
customer_reviews.author: oman1

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: Looks really well made, but it is extremely difficult to push/pull the plunger. I plan to toss it and buy something different.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: O-ring broke before first use
customer_reviews.text: The o-ring is broken and the injector leaks as a result.
customer_reviews.author: Q. G.

customer_reviews.title: great marinade injector
customer_reviews.text: it works very well. I ordered this while on vacation for my brother in law so we could make sure our Turkey would turn out perfectly in the smoker. This product simply works. Looks great and is made of very high quality/density metal.
customer_reviews.author: Gil

customer_reviews.title: Nice packaging. Make sure that you get the two ...
customer_reviews.text: Very solid construction. Nice packaging. Make sure that you get the two rubber o-rings that go on the attachment end of the injector needles. I nearly missed them and the injector leaks without them. If you install them, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Sugg

customer_reviews.title: Celebrating Memorial Day as a mad scientist
customer_reviews.text: Great product from a cool little company. Classy packaging that makes you excited to get in there and start injecting. the injector itself is pretty intimidating looking which is a nice feeling, a kind of a mad-scientist with a foodie-streak feeling that can really only be felt while holding a poised, dripping, horrifyingly large needle and stabbing it into a slab of meat and pushing your marinade into it as it swells with fluid and density and flavor. Do not use on humans.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A new chapter!
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I tried it on was a pork butt roast. I got instruction and recipe from amazing ribs .com .After injecting the roast I put it in a zip lock bag with some of juice left over and did the same with some pork ribs. I let them marinade in the refridgerator for two days turning them over once in a while in order to spread the marinade evenly. This injector is of professional grade and has opened a new chapter in my cooking. And by the way, the meat is delicious and tender through and through.
customer_reviews.author: Roger B

customer_reviews.title: but it appears to be very good quality. Looking forward to the opportunity to use ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet, but it appears to be very good quality. Looking forward to the opportunity to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product!
customer_reviews.text: I used it for the first time for my turkey breast for Thanksgiving - the injector seems very well made and durable and I hope to use it for many more years to come! Easy to clean, assemble and disassemble. I'd definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacy L. Garrison

customer_reviews.title: ) Its going to be a great new toy for cooking
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This thing has power. I should have read the directions first. I sqeezed the thing and I shot it across the room:) Its going to be a great new toy for cooking!
customer_reviews.author: G cat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love it, makes injecting whatever I want a breeze. You can do anything with it. Stop using the cheap little plastic things that come with marinades and start making up your own and using this heavy duty job here.
customer_reviews.author: fluffy

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny! And you dont need that may of them!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy duty product. Love the large holes in needle. Used a few times and have not had clogs. Have to admit feeling a little evil using it. Feel like that creepy DR from the cannonball run movie. LOL. Jokes aside well made product.
customer_reviews.author: STEVE

customer_reviews.title: Too Stiff for Comfort
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. I am sure it works for others but I just seems too stiff for me to inject. I wasn't too sure if it would get better with continuous use so I just got frustrated and stopped using it. Hopefully, I will be able to update my review once I get tired of eating dry meat and decide to give this thing another try.
customer_reviews.author: hedegi

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy injector
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy injector! I would definitely recommend it to others. 4 stars for two reasons: 1) Had to remove burrs with a file from the tip of the needle. 2) Packaging, although nice for marketing, inconvenient (although usable) for permanent storage.
customer_reviews.author: UpNorth

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This utensil worked easly and just as it as described. I'm so glad I got it. It adds such flavor. I used a thicker Teriyaki sauce thinking it may not go through and would clog, but ut worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Wisthoff

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: A great design that feels like a quality item. It is easy to use and clean. It takes a bit of practice to learn how to use, but with a little patience you will be rewarded.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Looks good overall
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet but it looks really nice and i see no reason why it would not work as expected. My only concern is that the removable back cover (the one with the two holes for the fingers) seems to be of a different material than the rest of the syringe and looks a little flimsy, hope it lasts !
customer_reviews.author: ricardo szuster

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat this price for a product that will last.
customer_reviews.text: Very well priced for this quality of product. Comes with additional seals, so I plan on this product serving me for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen gadget
customer_reviews.text: Great kitchen gadget. Worked WAYYY better than the plastic ones i have previously had. It was also very easy to take apart and clean it. I would highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Harris

customer_reviews.title: Quality look & feel. Works great too!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality, heavy duty, and durable. Would recommend to others. Do not have to worry about breaking or leaks. Came with access to an online injection marinade recipe book too.
customer_reviews.author: TomP

customer_reviews.title: I like that it has a needle for injecting chunks as ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few meat injectors, which were okay, but this one really does everything I need it to. I like that it has a needle for injecting chunks as well as the liquid injector. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Boomer7

customer_reviews.title: great injector
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Its heavy duty and easy to use. I do recommend lightly oiling the ring so it will slide easier in the chamber. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: April M

customer_reviews.title: ... and to be honest with you this is the best of the best this thing works perfect love it ...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of different injectors and to be honest with you this is the best of the best this thing works perfect love it so far !!!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. All Stainless Steel allows me to sterilize this for use with yeast propagation.

customer_reviews.title: Used once so far. It seems to work well ...
customer_reviews.text: Used once so far. It seems to work well so far. Just needs to be broken in a little bit but otherwise works well.
customer_reviews.author: ajlyman1

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful meat injector.
customer_reviews.text: This meat injector is very well made. It arrived fast. They give wonderful tips on how to use it. We used it to inject our deep fried turkey. It was delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Rose A. Devries

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be happier. Lots of power and super easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I got sick of the cheap injectors and decided to splurge on this one. I couldn't be happier. Lots of power and super easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Matty

customer_reviews.title: To suck on a bee sting
customer_reviews.text: My wife got stung by a bee. I was sucking on it to get as much of the venom out, thinking I should buy this product. It arrived and I tried it on my skin and there is nice suction.
customer_reviews.author: aa

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need, nothing you don't.
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need, and the packaging is the storage container. Smart.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Snyder

customer_reviews.title: best I have made
customer_reviews.text: Injected pork butt with grapefruit, apple and grape juice combo. Smoked over pecan for 10 hrs. Consumers said, best I have made.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Lillis

customer_reviews.title: I had been using grocery store plastic injectors that usually ...
customer_reviews.text: I had been using grocery store plastic injectors that usually lasted 2-3 uses. This has lasted all summer with lots of use.
customer_reviews.author: oo

customer_reviews.title: Nice Meat Injector
customer_reviews.text: This injector is more heavy duty than i thought it was going to be, I love the two needles for different tasks, easy cleanup. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: B. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: We are happy with the two different needle choice
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time we purchased a meat injector. We are happy with the two different needle choice...so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Rie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my husband who loves to cook and grill. It's a great utensil to inject marinades into chicken or steak. He absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: TerriB

customer_reviews.title: Send me an extra o-ring rubber please.
customer_reviews.text: After several use the o-ring rubber broke. Could not use the injector because the sauce kept on leaking. Boy it was a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Riz Soriano

customer_reviews.title: love my new meat infuser
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful service & product. Easy to use,comfortable in the hand & the quality far exceeded my expectations

customer_reviews.title: ... only used this once but it is a very nice injector. Not a cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: I admit I have only used this once but it is a very nice injector. Not a cheap plastic.

customer_reviews.title: I'll have a lot of fun with this when we back out turkey next week
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality meat injector. I'll have a lot of fun with this when we back out turkey next week.

customer_reviews.title: Great injector
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! Real solid made from thick gauge SS and everything fits perfectly together. Love the quality! And it comes in a really nice package. Really impressed with such quality for a very fair price!
customer_reviews.author: Manoly Kladovasilakis

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality, company follows up to make sure your happy with purchase. Definitely suggest this product
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: For the price, the quality itself is excellent. This is a pretty heavy duty meat injector. It contains o-rings for the plunger and both needles. I used it on a tri-tip I was smoking and worked perfect. No leaks, and clean up was a snap.
customer_reviews.author: Todd D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great value
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy duty quality with two fantastic needles. This company aims to please and has some great products and fair prices.
customer_reviews.author: Granny Goose 2

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and heavyweight. Looking forward to experimenting with the five (only) recipes on the referral website.

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good product. It is very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product. It is very sturdy.. and very easy to use. Cleaning is also very easy

customer_reviews.title: Great injector! Super heavy duty and very high quality
customer_reviews.text: Great injector! Super heavy duty and very high quality. I would definitely recommend this injector if you are in the market.
customer_reviews.author: Serik

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This injector is very well made. It does not leak and is perfect for injecting pork loins, brisket, ribs, or your meat of choice.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Snipes

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful
customer_reviews.text: Be careful using it. The two times I've used it, I ended up spraying marinade all over my kitchen. Maybe I'm doing something wrong. Otherwise item works as described.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The second needle is great for injecting marinade with minced garlic.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew T

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product was too big to inject steaks. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Mingypants

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and Does the Job. I've used it once and plan to use it a lot more frequently now that I see the flavor it injected into a roasted chicken
customer_reviews.author: Jayep

customer_reviews.title: needles have a great design having numerous holes for injecting marinade
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the 1st time, well made quality product, needles have a great design having numerous holes for injecting marinade. I received email from Mr. Grill on tips of using injector, great advice. I will use this at least once a week now that I have an injector that works. Best price compared to other injectors that seemed exactly the same
customer_reviews.author: Wanewoodworker

customer_reviews.title: Super high quality and works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Super high quality and works like a charm. I liked the two options of tips for liquid and minced marinades. I look forward to using this again.
customer_reviews.author: Mara Vernon

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with this. It will last a lifetime!
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty. This will last much longer than the cheap plastic one I had previously. This thing is built like a tank.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Fite

customer_reviews.title: Good  Bar B Q
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I am still experimenting with what to use in it,butter,westchester,A.1'''''''
customer_reviews.author: Norman

customer_reviews.title: It works well does not clog and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? It works well does not clog and easy to clean. I've had no problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very solid piece of kitchen equipment. works wonders on meats and poultry all metal construction.
customer_reviews.author: fun at one, cooking is the game

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great injector with solid build quality, recommended for bigger slabs of meat, etc
customer_reviews.author: Anthony W.

customer_reviews.title: great packaging and a product that lives up to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Prompt shipping, great packaging and a product that lives up to the description. The plastic ones don't last long enough to count.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie Stew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The prefect meat injector. Just what I was looking for.The three different needles are a must. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Magwire

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Injector with two needles for any need. Did Pork Butts and everyone wanted my secret. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Disco in Myrtle Beach

product_meta.title: GRILLHOGS Marinade Meat Injector Kit, 304 Premium Stainless Steel BBQ Grill Syringe, Great Basting Tool for Larger Cuts of Meat Like Turkey, Grilling Gifts for Men, 2-Oz Capacity Barrel with 3 Needles
feature_bullets: *THE ULTIMATE MARINADE INJECTOR*: Includes a free bonus eBook download containing great food injector recipes for fabulous tasting meals by easily adding delicious marinade flavors. Become a cooking legend by creating ultra flavorsome and super moist grills, roasts and BBQs!

*DELUXE PROFESSIONAL CHEF QUALITY*: 304 Stainless Steel, made from the highest grade food quality stainless steel to ensure 100% that your new meat marinator is completely food safe and ensures product durability. Constructed of heavy 304 Food Grade stainless steel for all food-facing components including, barrel, barrel nose, plunger and needles.

*MARINATE QUICKLY AND EASILY*: Complete with 3 specialized marinade injector needles which are designed for precision marinade injection into any cut meat size. Complete with small needle for marinating smaller cuts.

*PERFECT FOR ANY MEAT*: This meat injector is perfect for keeping meat moist and tasty and improves the flavor of brisket, pork, chicken, turkey, lamb, goose, duck, and more! Durable and the needles inject any meat or poultry easily, enriching the taste and ensuring your meat is bursting with flavor.

*HUNGRY FAN COMMUNITY*: By purchasing this product, you now become part of the largest community of game day and entertainment enthusiasts! We value the quality and durability of our products and strive to produce the best grilling accessories for you. We have absolute faith in our products and offer a money back guaranteed if you are not satisfied. No-questions-asked, no hassle.
